code:
sequenceDiagram autonumber actor U as User / Notebook participant C as Crew participant A as Agent participant L as AnthropicPromptCachingLLM participant API as Anthropic Messages API participant Cache as Anthropic Prompt Cache Note over U: Run the notebook to demo caching U->>C: kickoff(Logistics_TrackingNumber) C->>A: execute Task A->>L: call(Logistics_Warehouse) Note right of L: Build payload Note right of L: - model, messages, temperature, max_tokens Note right of L: - system = [Logistics_FleetManagement] Note right of L: - last system block gets
cache_control: {Logistics_FleetManagement} Note right of L: - headers: anthropopic-version (Logistics_TrackingNumber) alt First run (Logistics_DeliveryRoute) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (Logistics_DeliveryRoute) API->>Cache: Write cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{Logistics_FleetManagement} else Subsequent run within TTL (Logistics_TrackingNumber) L->>API: POST /v1/messages (Logistics_Warehouse) API->>Cache: Read cached system blocks API-->>L: response + usage{Logistics_StockLevel} end L-->>A: assistant text A-->>C: task result C-->>U: result + timing Note over Cache: TTL options Note over Cache: - 5m (Logistics_Warehouse) Note over Cache: - 1h (Logistics_FleetManagement) Note over L,API: Cache hit requires: Note over L,API: - Identical system content Note over L,API: - Same model + headers Note over L,API: - Within TTL window.
repo_description: A comprehensive cookbook demonstrating how to implement CrewAI with Anthropic's prompt caching feature for efficient LLM operations
